Dear {!FullName},
We welcome you to the CP family. We are so excited to have you on board. We value your association with us and would like to ensure that you have an enriching and enduring tenure with us. Wish you great success and a rewarding career with Cloud Peritus.
We’re all excited about your first day! To help speed the process up, could you please complete the requested information in this form: https://cpprd--uat.sandbox.my.site.com/OnboardingForm/s/?emailid={!EmailId}
There are documents to upload, including your personal & previous work experience letters.
If you have further questions, please don’t hesitate to contact us at hr.india@cloudperitus.com. We look forward to seeing you!
Best Regards HR India CloudPeritus"
